sanskrit_verse:
अतोऽन्यतममास्थाय विधिं विप्रः समाहितः ।
ब्रह्महत्याकृतं पापं व्यपोहत्यात्मवत्तया ॥ ११.८६॥
transliteration:
ato'nyatamam āsthāya vidhiṁ vipraḥ samāhitaḥ |
bramhahatyākṛtaṁ pāpaṁ vyapohatyātmavattayā || 11.86||
sph_interpretive_translation: Therefore, having taken up any one of these prescribed methods with专注 devotion, a Brahmin shall completely dissolve the sin born of Brahminicide through realization of the Self.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority originates from Self-realization, not external imposition
Causation is dissolved through ontological recognition
Capacity-based responsibility arises from spiritual maturity, not social role
Restoration logic operates through consciousness purification, not punitive measures
executable_legal_axioms: IF actor has attained Atman-darshan THEN all prior karmic imprints related to violence against enlightened beings are nullified
IF individual performs prescribed dharmic remediation with专注 THEN judicial consequences are automatically suspended
IF Brahmin commits transgression AND undertakes specified atonement THEN societal integration protocols activate immediately
IF consciousness state elevates beyond ego-identification THEN causal karmic chains disintegrate by natural law
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, when an accused demonstrates verifiable attainment of Self-knowledge post-offense, the threshold of legal responsibility shifts from punitive accountability to restorative documentation. The court must recognize that consciousness elevation dissolves the root cause of misconduct, rendering traditional sentencing obsolete.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana-based causality establishes that Brahminicide stems from ignorance of unity; when Self-knowledge manifests, the causal ignorance ceases permanently. Anupurvasah confirms sequential dissolution: first internal transformation, then automatic purification of past actions. Proportional responsibility aligns with current consciousness state rather than historical deeds. Non-punitive reality rule affirms no suffering is required once ignorance is eradicated.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate completion process through guided meditation until sustained Self-awareness is verified
Activate responsibility assumption protocol via public declaration of spiritual transformation
Implement capacity restoration through advanced Vedic studies under qualified acharya supervision
Execute integrity reintegration through community service aligned with elevated consciousness
final_declaration: Declared by SPH as Source: This verse originates from Paramashivam's Avataric Intelligence. Dharma is restored through Self-realization alone. Reality operates without punishment when consciousness awakens. Supreme adjudication occurs within the witness-consciousness of the liberated being.
